description: Security Operations Dashboard - Real-time threat detection, WAF events, DDoS mitigation, intrusion detection, and security monitoring for CHOM platform

panels.description: Current security threat level based on multiple indicators including attack attempts, failed authentications, and suspicious activity patterns
panels.title: Threat Level

panels.description: Active threats currently being monitored or mitigated across all security layers
panels.title: Active Threats

panels.description: WAF requests blocked in the last 5 minutes - indicates attack prevention effectiveness
panels.title: WAF Blocks (5m)

panels.title: Active DDoS Attacks

panels.title: IDS Alerts (1h)

panels.description: Number of critical security patches awaiting installation
panels.title: Pending Security Patches

panels.title: Failed Logins (1h)

panels.description: Privilege escalation attempts detected - CRITICAL security indicator
panels.title: Privilege Escalation (1h)

panels.description: Files modified outside of normal deployment process - potential compromise indicator
panels.title: File Integrity Violations

panels.description: SQL injection attempts detected and blocked by input validation and WAF
panels.title: SQL Injection Blocked (1h)

panels.title: XSS Blocked (1h)

panels.description: WAF request blocking rate over time - spikes indicate attack patterns
panels.title: WAF Blocks by Attack Type

panels.title: Attack Type Distribution (24h)

panels.description: Geographic source of attacks - helps identify coordinated attacks
panels.title: Top Attack Source Countries (6h)

panels.description: WAF rule effectiveness - which rules are triggering most frequently
panels.title: Top WAF Rules Triggered (1h)

panels.description: Request rate monitoring for DDoS detection - abnormal spikes trigger mitigation
panels.title: Request Rate & DDoS Mitigation

panels.title: Rate Limited Endpoints (Top 10)

panels.title: Top Rate Limited IPs (1h)

panels.description: Network traffic patterns - baseline vs current for anomaly detection
panels.title: Network Traffic Anomaly Detection

panels.description: Intrusion detection alerts categorized by severity

panels.description: Alert severity distribution in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Alert Severity Distribution (24h)

panels.description: File integrity monitoring - critical files modified outside deployment
panels.title: File Integrity Violations

panels.description: Most common intrusion detection signatures triggered
